title: Colnago Y1Rs With Rainbow Stripes Debuts Under Tadej Pogačar
content:
We’ve already seen it raced at the UAE Tour Women but Pogačar’s Colnago Y1Rs has the sacred rainbow stripes and a 3D printed Wahoo mount.

Read the full article at Colnago Y1Rs With Rainbow Stripes Debuts Under Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
